import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import CommentList from './CommentList' import FormComment from './FormComment'; // Parameter: // comments: array object const user = (JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("userAuth"))).user export default function Post({ _id, sender, content, creationTime, emoji, comments }) { useEffect(() => { console.log("Success") }, []) return (
{/* LEFT */}

{sender.firstName + " " + sender.lastName}

{creationTime}

{/* RIGHT */}

{content.text}

{/* Emoji */}
Heart
Comment
Share
{/* Form Comment */} {/* Group Comment */}
) }
